items.name: Praxis
explicitMods: -8 to Total Mana Cost of Skills
8% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
flavourText: The Thaumaturgical masters of the Eternal Empire,
as unpredictable and varied as they were,
all understood one thing:
Free thinking leads to free action.
To own a piece of the Nightmare, you must first belong to the Nightmare.
Turn the crank,
close your eyes,
and pray to the gods
for a pleasant surprise.

items.secDescrText: Fires a slow-moving projectile that pierces through enemies, dealing cold damage.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: Eternal beauty has a cost, one which Shavronne was happy to pay with the lives of others.
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.
They say it is the head that leads, but all must flow through the body at some point.
A taste of power brings a hunger for more.

Their life left for others.

items.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Snakebite
explicitMods: 2% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
6% increased Accuracy Rating per Frenzy Charge
10% reduced Frenzy Charge Duration per Frenzy Charge
Attacks have 60% chance to Poison while at maximum Frenzy Charges
flavourText: "As the serpent shuns thought,
It shuns fear.
It strikes with the speed of wrath
And the skill of compulsion."
- Deshret, The Red Sekhema

items.name: Doedre's Scorn
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Curse on Enemy
Curse Skills have 43% increased Skill Effect Duration
flavourText: A scar of the flesh you'll never forget,
A scar of the mind you'll never remember.

items.name: Southbound
explicitMods: Adds 36 to 49 Cold Damage to Attacks
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

items.name: Cloak of Flame
explicitMods: Reflects 15 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
20% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage
flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

items.name: Wake of Destruction
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 120 Lightning Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee
enchantMods: 50% chance to Avoid being Stunned if you've Killed Recently
flavourText: Tempest's power given form,
Flee before the walking storm.

items.name: Skullhead
explicitMods: Minions have +10% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Minions Regenerate 2% of Life per second
flavourText: All that was left of the Iron King was his bleached skull.
Yet it was all the Iron King needed.

items.name: Veil of the Night
explicitMods: Reflects 1 to 205 Lightning Damage to Attackers on Block
flavourText: The seeds of greatness are planted in darkness,
Watered by suffering,
Tended by desperation,
And bloom steel flowers of victory.

items.name: Meginord's Vise
explicitMods: Regenerate 2% of Life per second with at least 400 Strength
enchantMods: Trigger Word of Flames on Hit
flavourText: Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.

items.name: Shavronne's Pace
explicitMods: 20% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
flavourText: Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

items.name: Speaker's Wreath
explicitMods: 2% increased Minion Attack Speed per 50 Dexterity
2% increased Minion Movement Speed per 50 Dexterity
Minions' Hits can only Kill Ignited Enemies
flavourText: A strong pair of legs may carry you far,
but a silver tongue and a few brutes
can take you to the edge of the world.

items.name: Deerstalker
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 11 Trap
15% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap
flavourText: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

items.name: Dendrobate
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Lesser Poison
86% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
21% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence
flavourText: Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:
the most dangerous animals
are the ones who don't bother to hide.

items.name: Asenath's Mark
flavourText: Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.

items.name: Alberon's Warpath
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks
flavourText: Alberon walked among the accursed,
and they welcomed him.

items.name: Sin Trek
explicitMods: Enemies Cannot Leech Life From you
flavourText: Do not let them step on your feet. Keep them at bay.

items.name: Invasion Strap
craftedMods: Flasks applied to you have 3% increased Effect

items.name: Repentance
flavourText: "I ask not for understanding,
only for forgiveness
for what I am about to do.
There will be blood on these shackles yet."
- Anonymous carving, Axiom Prison.

items.name: The Covenant
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Added Chaos Damage
flavourText: My Soul is your Strength
My Price is your Blood

items.name: Icetomb
flavourText: When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

items.name: Stormcharger
explicitMods: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
flavourText: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

items.name: Bramblejack
explicitMods: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
-2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
40% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker
flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

items.name: Redblade Tramplers
explicitMods: Adds 3 to 8 Physical Damage to Attacks
flavourText: Our home was swallowed beneath
the great mountain for our complacency.
Now we must prove our value to the Molten One
by sating his hunger for life.

items.name: Crown of Thorns
explicitMods: Reflects 5 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
+5 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

The spikes point out and in, you know.

items.name: Mindspiral
explicitMods: Gain 6% of Maximum Mana as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
Enemies Cannot Leech Mana From you
9% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
flavourText: Where top is bottom and weak is strong.

items.name: Doedre's Tenure
flavourText: While Doedre lacked Maligaro's sense of style,
she surpassed her master in pure malevolence.

items.name: Starkonja's Head
explicitMods: 50% reduced Damage when on Low Life
150% increased Global Evasion Rating when on Low Life
flavourText: There was no hero made out of Starkonja's death,
but merely a long sleep made eternal.

items.name: Rainbowstride
flavourText: "They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride.
Some men have a longer stride than others."
- Gaius Sentari

items.name: Zahndethus' Cassock
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block
flavourText: When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls

items.name: Lochtonial Caress
explicitMods: 10% chance to gain a Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charge on Kill
flavourText: Why cling to your sanity? It offers you nothing.
Surrender to me, and I will grant you everything.

items.name: Hrimnor's Resolve
explicitMods: Cannot be Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently
flavourText: Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

items.name: Lioneye's Paws
explicitMods: Adds 12 to 24 Fire Damage to Attacks
40% reduced Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Stunned when on Low Life
flavourText: Stand and lead the righteous pride,
Fight till death, never hide.

items.name: Facebreaker
explicitMods: 703% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Attacks

items.name: The Three Dragons
explicitMods: Your Fire Damage can Shock but not Ignite
Your Cold Damage can Ignite but not Freeze or Chill
Your Lightning Damage can Freeze but not Shock
flavourText: "The ice seared his naked feet
As the lightning stilled his heart,
But it was the flames upon his lover's face
That roused him to vengeance."
- From 'The Three Dragons' by Victario of Sarn

items.name: Bones of Ullr
explicitMods: +1 to Level of all Raise Zombie Gems
+1 to Level of all Raise Spectre Gems
flavourText: The dead man walks where
the living fear to tread.

items.name: Iron Heart
explicitMods:
Strength's Damage Bonus instead grants 3% increased Melee
Physical Damage per 10 Strength
flavourText: "The Council have a great many secrets.
Some are better kept that way, Cospri."
- Mauritius, the Iron Heart

items.name: Kingsguard
explicitMods: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge

items.name: Slitherpinch
explicitMods: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

explicitMods: 4% increased Melee Damage per Endurance Charge

items.name: Deidbell

items.name: Ezomyte Peak

items.name: Maligaro's Virtuosity

second sight is ideal for handling all artefacts that seek to subvert Fate.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: For deciphering the language of the inscrutable ones, honoured Sarina,
we charge you with investigating their intent in our land.

explicitMods: 150% more Unique Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Go to your rest now, Sumei, Master Lorekeeper. The Order shall keep
contained the terrible secret that burdened your final years.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Mouth of the Masses, whose greatness spreads by our breath and touch,
who feeds the starving with the starved, the strong with the weak.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Webs are torn, not untangled.

explicitMods:
Area contains Metamorph Monsters
Metamorph Bosses which drop an Itemised Sample drop an additional Itemised Sample
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As you explore the vast well of human darkness, Saresh, our Surgeon of the Dead,
remember that the price can sometimes exceed the value of knowledge.

items.descrText: Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Maraketh Emblem.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Eternal Emblem.
Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Master Warrior Rindwik fell to one opponent alone: old age.
Only the greatest soldiers can say as much.

items.descrText: Place two or more different Emblems in a Map Device to access the Domain of Timeless Conflict. Can only be used once.
Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: What is not cannot cause harm.

items.descrText: Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Vaal Emblem.

Area contains an additional Legion Encounter
Each Legion contains a War Hoard
Each Legion is accompanied by a General
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Given the fate of Deacon Eutychus and the men under Cardinal Sanctus Vox,
let none dare the Domain, lest they too feed that vile hunger eternal.

explicitMods:
Adds Elder Influence outcome to Map Area
30% more Rare Elder Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your visions led the Azmeri down into a world left abandoned by the Vaal.
They cast you out, young Egrin, but the Order of the Djinn accepts you.

items.descrText: Place two or more different Emblems in a Map Device to access the Domain of Timeless Conflict. Can only be used once.
Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: For your valour beyond the Gate, Sarina Titucius, we honour you with the first
Gilded Scarab awarded while its recipient still lives. Remain vigilant.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Corruption is purged, not cleansed.

explicitMods:
Adds Shaper Influence outcome to Map Area
60% more Rare Shaper Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Bold dreamer, Qianga of the Stars, she of the Celestial Cold! These titles
we bestow upon the one among us whose soul speaks to the ineffable.

items.descrText: Place two or more different Emblems in a Map Device to access the Domain of Timeless Conflict. Can only be used once.

explicitMods: 100% more Unique Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As the best of our lorekeepers, honoured Sumei, it is now your task
to investigate the mysterious duplication of artefacts of power.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Consider yourself an orphaned Eternal no longer, young Betucia.
The Order of the Djinn is your family now.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: For your loyalty and valour, honoured Betucia, we are proud to put
the requisition of dream-artefacts in your capable hands.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Omid, Master Researcher, has left a final commandment upon his death:
the world must never know.

items.descrText: Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Karui Emblem.
Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Betucia, Bearer of the Sealing Blade, the Order of the Djinn survives
because of your sacrifice, but will be forever wounded by your loss.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Look to our Queen, for she will lead us from the darkness.

explicitMods:
Area contains 4 additional Perandus Chests
Area contains Cadiro Perandus
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The dark day has come, Icius Perandus. Today either we succeed or humanity dies.
Enact your plan. Prevent the fate of the Vaal from befalling the Eternal Empire!

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Enter the crucible. The nexus of
nothingness and equilibrium of eternity.

items.descrText: Place two or more different Emblems in a Map Device to access the Domain of Timeless Conflict. Can only be used once.

explicitMods:

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: For harnessing and controlling the power of lightning, you, Raethan,
are now charged with researching this new energy.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Rejected even by the Faridun outcasts, young Saresh, you were cursed to walk the
white sands until we found you. The Order shall command your penance now.

explicitMods:
Area contains Niko
Map owner gains 20% more Sulphite
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As the first Brinerot to join the Order, you have much to prove,
young Raethan. We are confident you will succeed.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Ember-dwellers sought to throw you to their volcanic god, young Omid,
but we caught you instead. The Order of the Djinn is your tribe now.

items.descrText: Place two or more different Emblems in a Map Device to access the Domain of Timeless Conflict. Can only be used once.
Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your outlaw camp abandoned you when their surprise attack failed, young Rindwik.
Now that you know we exist, we cannot let you go. You have two choices.

items.descrText: Travel to Chayula's Domain by using this item in a personal Map Device. Can only be used once.
Combine 100 splinters to create Chayula's Breachstone.

explicitMods:
Area contains Einhar
Area contains 3 additional Red Beasts
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Order was your clan in life, Agnar, Beastmaster, but the First Ones call
back their favoured son. The gift of their Visions will pass to another.

explicitMods:
Area contains an additional Legion Encounter
Each Legion contains a War Hoard
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As our hand in the Chamber, we grant you, Deacon Eutychus,
access to a domain we lack the resources to explore.

items.descrText: Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Templar Emblem.

explicitMods:
Area contains Niko
Map owner gains 60% more Sulphite
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Let him not be called Raethan the Betrayer. His discovery was too important
to keep locked away. Now, for good or ill, it is in civilisation's hands.

explicitMods:
Area contains Einhar
Area contains 2 additional Red Beasts
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: None among us understand the beasts of this world better than you,
honoured Agnar. You will root out the mysteries of wild-artefacts.

explicitMods:
Adds Elder Influence outcome to Map Area
60% more Rare Elder Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Speaker of unclean truths, Egrin of the Dark Between Stars.
We curse you whose soul echoes the madness of the void!

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Only those who aspire can dare to hope.

explicitMods:
Adds Shaper Influence outcome to Map Area
30% more Rare Shaper Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Peak-dwellers saw you as impure, young Qianga, but the Order of
the Djinn sees you as all the stronger for your uniqueness.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Young Tsarsk, you were a broken and forgotten child lying glassy-eyed
in a flesh-pit in Trarthus, but the Order found and cleansed you.

explicitMods: 50% more Unique Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Maraketh left you to die alone in the desert, young Sumei, but we
saw the potential in you. The Order of the Djinn is your akhara now.

explicitMods:
Area contains Einhar
Area contains an additional Red Beast
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Feuding Ezomytes slaughtered your kin, young Agnar, but we pulled you
from the flames. The Order of the Djinn is your clan now.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: The Vaal shall never fear the setting of our sun.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Look to our Queen, for she will lead us into the light.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: We task you, honoured Omid, with the investigation of this mysterious
'Xoph' and artefacts related to rifts in the boundaries of our world.

explicitMods:
Adds Shaper Influence outcome to Map Area
90% more Rare Shaper Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Qianga of the Stars, Deliverer of the Sealing Blade to the Watchers, go now, and
let your half-dreamt life be troubled by nightmares of achromic hunger no more.

explicitMods: 150% more Divination Cards found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your centuries of service have been invaluable to us, Narumoa. Go now,
return to Hinekora, and join your ancient kin in the halls of the dead.

explicitMods:
Area contains 2 additional Perandus Chests
Area has a 33% chance to contain Cadiro Perandus
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: We plucked you from Malachai's torturous grasp, Icius Perandus, for a reason.
Mankind is in grave peril. By accepting this scarab, you pledge your life.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your people were renegades, Rindwik, but you have proven your loyalty.
You will lead the martial defence of our expeditions.

items.descrText: Travel to the Aspirants' Plaza and spend this item to open the Eternal Labyrinth. You must have completed the six different Trials of Ascendancy found in Maps in order to access this area.
flavourText: It is time for the Goddess to give her final verdict.
Your fate rests in her even hands.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: The light without pales in comparison to the light within.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Though you were swallowed by your own darkness, you saved countless others
from eternal misery, young Tsarsk. You were not nothing, as you feared.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Freedom is won, not given.

explicitMods:
Adds Elder Influence outcome to Map Area
90% more Rare Elder Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Egrin of the Dark Between Stars, Forger of the Sealing Blade,
let your name be redeemed by your unexpected sacrifice.

flavourText: Power is a curious thing.
It can be contained, hidden, locked away,
and yet it always breaks free.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.

Let this be the start of a new era of cooperation.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your ancestry has been much maligned by history, young Sarina Titucius,
but to the Order of the Djinn, you are born anew.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.

you have shown your intellect, Icius. The Order of the Djinn puts its faith in you.
